<div>

This interactive map is part of the article: **"Seropositivity to Dengue virus DENV in three neighborhoods in the periphery of a city with a recent history of outbreaks in Argentina: what can we learn from unreported cases?"**[^1][^2]

Authors: DA Mendicino, T Ricardo, MA Cristaldi, M Maglianesi, G Guzmán S Claussen, RG Chiaraviglio, CA Ávalos, MA Previtali. (2024).

Licensed under [CC BY-NC 4.0](#0){style="text-align: center; font-size: 11pt;"} ![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,){alt="data:image/svg+xml;base64," width="4%"}![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,){alt="data:image/svg+xml;base64," width="4%"}![](data:image/svg+xml;base64,){alt="data:image/svg+xml;base64," width="4%"}

</div>

[^1]: Spatial layers downloaded from [OpenStreetMap®](https://www.openstreetmap.org/#map=4/-40.44/-63.59) and [Plataforma Abierta de Datos Espaciales de la Argentina (POBLACIONES)](https://poblaciones.org/category/cartografias/); marker icons from [Freepik](https://www.freepik.com/).

[^2]: Layers from POBLACIONES were read and processed using the [xlsx2geojson](https://github.com/Issengard83/xlsx2geojson) R package, developed by Dr. Tamara Ricardo

```{r}
#| echo: false
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = F, message = F, warning = F,
                      fig.align = "center", dpi = 300)
## Load packages
pacman::p_load(
  # Map tools
  sf, 
  tmap,
  tmaptools,
  maptiles,
  scico,
  tidyverse)
```

```{r}
# Load spatial layers
## Sampled neighborhoods
neighborhoods <- st_read("gis/neighborhoods.geojson", quiet = T)


## Health centers and hospitals
health_units <- st_read("gis/health_units.geojson", quiet = T)


## Health vulnerability
health_v <- st_read("gis/health_v.geojson", quiet = T) |> 
  mutate(sanitary_vulnerability = sanitary_vulnerability*100 |> round(1))

## Strata by census tract
strata <- st_read("gis/strata_ct.geojson", quiet = T)
  
```

```{r}
# Create map pins
hosp_icons <- tmap_icons(file = c("images/placeholder_429238.png",
                             "images/hospital_11384594.png"))

icons <- tmap_icons(file = "images/pin_10075433.png")
```

```{r}
# Generate map
map <-
  # base map
  tm_basemap(server = "OpenStreetMap") +
    
  # health vulnerability
    tm_shape(shp = health_v) +
    tm_polygons(col = "sanitary_vulnerability",
                style = "pretty",
              palette = scico(n = 5, palette = "acton",
                              direction = -1, alpha = .9),
              title = "Sanitary vulnerability (%)",
              border.alpha = .25,
              group = "health",
              popup.vars = F) +
    
    # social strata
    tm_shape(shp = strata) +
    tm_polygons(col = "socioeconomic_strata", 
              style = "pretty",
              palette = scico(n = 8, palette = "imola",
                              direction = -1, alpha = .9),
              title = "Socioeconomic strata",
              border.alpha = .25,
              group = "strata",
              popup.vars = F) +
  
  # population density
  tm_shape(shp = strata) +
  tm_polygons(col = "population", 
              convert2density = T,
              area = "area_km2",
              style = "quantile",
              palette = scico(n = 10, palette = "tokyo",
                              direction = -1, alpha = .9),
              title = "Population density (km2)",
              border.alpha = .25,
              group = "population",
              popup.vars = c("census tract" = "census_tract", 
                             "area (km2)" = "area_km2", 
                             "population",
                             "population density" = "density_km2", 
                             "households", 
                             "households with NBI (%)" = "households_nbi",
                             "households without tap water (%)" = "households_no_tap_water", 
                             "households without sewage (%)" = "households_no_sewage",
                             "socioeconomic strata" = "socioeconomic_strata")) +
  
  # add health units pins
  tm_shape(shp = health_units) +
  tm_bubbles(shape = "category",
             shapes = hosp_icons,
             border.lwd = 0,
             border.col = "white",
             scale = .5,
             group = "health pins"
             ) +
  
  ## add sampled neighborhoods pins
  tm_shape(shp = neighborhoods) +
    tm_polygons(col = scico(n = 1, palette = "buda",
                            alpha = .5),
               group = "neighborhoods") +
    
      tm_bubbles(shape = icons,
             scale = .5,
             group = "neighborhoods pins"
            )
    
```

```{r}
## Display interactive map
tmap_mode("view")

map %>% 
  tmap_leaflet() %>%
  leaflet::hideGroup(group = c("strata","health"))
```
